Title: Extremely Rare 12-Size Stainless Breguet Pocket Watch CA1940s
Description: Extremely Rare 12-Size Stainless Breguet Pocket Watch Swiss; Breguet; Man’s; Serial # 3,053; CA1940 CASE: The 12-size No. 191,829 open face white stainless steel case is plain. DIAL: This silver metal dial features marker numerals. MOVT: The 16-jewel stem-set nickel movement has a lever escapement and a bridge-style layout. C 3 (The case is in very good condition) D 3 (The dial is in very good condition) M 2 (The movement is in perfect condition) R 9 (Rarity on a scale of #1 being very common to #10 being extremely rare) Experts Opinion: Mint and rare – A watch for the true gentleman! Made by the company once owned by the true master A. Breguet.
